name: Nest (Harley Torrisi)
description:
Created By

  • Harley Torrisi - Designer / Programmer
  • Fae Daunt - Narrator
  • Ben Houghton - Programmer

Be apart of a small little forest where you will guide animals through some of their many daily duties. Move through the world with unique controls for each animal that represents how they move. Feel like you're in a child's picture book with cute narrations and visual dialog.

Game-pad Only!!!
Xbox controller recommended.

-Left Joystick

-Right Joystick

-A Button
